channel.title: Actions Proccessed Twice Bug, led to 4 Unseen with a pseudo-assassin
channel.description:
#### What happened?![Bug%20Screenshot%201|690x388](upload://yOL3e0L8bswj3ZAYALderJA8tNR.jpeg)![Bug%20Screenshot%202|690x388](upload://fd0TYpzJGdfnYwvWcWbOF0YQ85j.jpeg) Essentially, actions processed multiple times and as mm, due to the fact that I was on my third night without converts, I was able to gain one normal convert then a second pseudo-assassin who couldn't do anything but day actions.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Night actions only happen once. #### Steps to reproduce: I have no clue. #### Comments: Made the game pretty broken when gained majority a turn earlier. Super funny. Bug was not restricted to me, everyone in the game had their actions process more than once. 14 becomes the pseudo-assassin
